supportDesc.support: Paper, pen and ink with some wash, over traces of black chalk.

handDesc.handNote: Mirror writing by Leonardo in brown ink.

physDesc.additions: Accompanied by anatomical sketches and notes surrounding the main image.

provenance.p: Part of the Anatomical Manuscript A, later acquired by the British Royal Collection.

div.p: This sheet by Leonardo da Vinci contains one of the earliest accurate renderings of a fetus in the womb, accompanied by anatomical and conceptual notes. It exemplifies his intense study of human reproduction and internal organs.

Questo foglio di Leonardo da Vinci contiene una delle prime rappresentazioni accurate di un feto nell’utero, accompagnata da annotazioni anatomiche e concettuali. Rappresenta un esempio dell’intenso studio che l’artista dedicò alla riproduzione umana e agli organi interni.
